text: GRC '14, short for Giessen Rijswijk Combinatie 2014, is an association football club from Giessen, Netherlands. Home games are played at Sportpark Almbos. It plays in the Eerste Klasse. ==History== GRC '14 was founded on July 1, 2014 as a merger of VV Giessen (founded 16 July 1963) and Rijswijkse Boys (founded 6 July 1945). Two years later the club made it to the Eerste Klasse Saturday C from 4th position through playoffs. In 2019–2020 it continues to play in the Eerste Klasse, after just barely keeping out of the relegation playoffs. ===Chief coach=== * Marcel van Helmond (2014–2018)https://regio- voetbal.nl/nieuws/marcel-van-helmond-aan-laatste-seizoen-bezig-bij- grc-14https://www.bd.nl/amateurvoetbal/marcel-van-helmond-einde-seizoen-weg- bij-grc-14~a4169997/ * Piet de Kruif (since 2018)https://regio- voetbal.nl/nieuws/piet-de-kruif-ook-volgend-seizoen-trainer- grc-14https://regio-voetbal.nl/nieuws/piet-de-kruif-grc-14-minder-goals-tegen- en-ons-eerder-veilig-spelen ==References== ==External links== *Official website *GRC '14 at Hollandse velden Category:Football clubs in the Netherlands Category:Football clubs in North Brabant Category:Football clubs in Altena, North Brabant Category:Land van Heusden en Altena Category:Woudrichem
title: GRC '14
